channel.title: pfSense on Digital Avenue | Comprehensive DevOps Guide
channel.description: Recent content in pfSense on Digital Avenue | Comprehensive DevOps Guide

item.title: How To Setup an OpenVPN on pfSense with Dual-WAN Interfaces as Fail-over
item.description: Introduction: OpenVPN is really useful to access your office when you are out of the office. In this tutorial, I’m going to show you how to set up your own VPN connection using with OpenVPN service on the pfSense firewall.

item.title: Configure Local DHCP Server and DNS Resolver on pfSense
item.description: Hi Guys today I’m goning to demonstrate how to install and configure dhcp server and dns reslover on pfsense 2.
